title: Bolt spells
data:
***Version [0.31](/0.31 "0.31")**: This article **may not be** up to date for the [latest stable release](/0.32 "0.32") of Crawl.*

The **Bolt spells** are a series of spells which all function similarly, hitting multiple targets along its line of fire. Although there is some variance in their damage output and range, they all behave in nearly the same fashion. [Repel missiles](/Repel_missiles "Repel missiles") is less effective at repelling bolt projectiles.

Players no longer have access to any "traditional" bolt spell in their spell library, though bolts are still accessible through other ways.

## Contents

- [1 Player-Castable](#Player-Castable)

- [2 Evocable](#Evocable)

  - [2.1 Thunderbolt](#Thunderbolt)
  - [2.2 Corrosive Bolt](#Corrosive_Bolt)
  - [2.3 Quicksilver Bolt](#Quicksilver_Bolt)
  - [2.4 Bolt of Light](#Bolt_of_Light)
  - [2.5 Sword Beam](#Sword_Beam)

- [3 Major Destruction](#Major_Destruction)

  - [3.1 Bolt of Fire](#Bolt_of_Fire)
  - [3.2 Bolt of Magma](#Bolt_of_Magma)
  - [3.3 Bolt of Draining](#Bolt_of_Draining)
  - [3.4 Lightning Bolt](#Lightning_Bolt)

- [4 Monster](#Monster)

  - [4.1 Bolt of Fire](#Bolt_of_Fire_2)
  - [4.2 Bolt of Cold](#Bolt_of_Cold)
  - [4.3 Crystal Bolt](#Crystal_Bolt)
  - [4.4 Bolt of Draining](#Bolt_of_Draining_2)
  - [4.5 Bolt of Devastation](#Bolt_of_Devastation)
  - [4.6 Lightning Bolt](#Lightning_Bolt_2)
  - [4.7 Bolt of Magma](#Bolt_of_Magma_2)
  - [4.8 Quicksilver Bolt](#Quicksilver_Bolt_2)
  - [4.9 Venom Bolt](#Venom_Bolt)

- [5 History/Trivia](#History.2FTrivia)

## Player-Castable

Almost all bolt spells have been removed from player libraries, although there are a few spells that create bolts:

- [Plasma Beam](/Plasma_Beam "Plasma Beam")
- [Shock](/Shock "Shock")
- [Starburst](/Starburst "Starburst")

## [Evocable](/Evocable "Evocable")

### [Thunderbolt](/Thunderbolt "Thunderbolt")

- Available through a [lightning rod](/Lightning_rod "Lightning rod")
- Power determined by [Evocations](/Evocations "Evocations")
- Consecutive zaps increases strength and changes behavior of the bolt
  - Aiming for a different target creates a wide spray that covers the area between the previous bolt and the current bolt
- Deals [electricity](/Electricity "Electricity") damage; deals less damage when spread over a wide area
- Range 5

### [Corrosive Bolt](/Corrosive_Bolt "Corrosive Bolt")

- Available to players through a [wand of acid](/Wand_of_acid "Wand of acid"), [Nemelex](/Nemelex "Nemelex")'s [Vitriol card](/Vitriol_card "Vitriol card"), or [Makhleb](/Makhleb "Makhleb"). The wand [alternates](/Alternate_items "Alternate items") with quicksilver and light.
- Power determined by [Evocations](/Evocations "Evocations") (wand) or [Invocations](/Invocations "Invocations") (god)
- Deals [acid](/Acid "Acid") damage.
- Inflicts [corrosion](/Acid#Corrosion "Acid").
- Range 5

### [Quicksilver Bolt](/Quicksilver_Bolt "Quicksilver Bolt")

- Available to players through a [wand of quicksilver](/Wand_of_quicksilver "Wand of quicksilver"), or purple [draconian](/Draconian "Draconian") breath. The wand [alternates](/Alternate_items "Alternate items") with acid and quicksilver.
- Deals irresistible damage
- Strips [cancellable](/Potion_of_cancellation "Potion of cancellation") enchantments from targets
- Range 7

### Bolt of Light

- Available to players through a [wand of light](/Wand_of_light "Wand of light"). The wand [alternates](/Alternate_items "Alternate items") with acid and quicksilver.
- Deals irresistible damage
- [Blinds](/Blind "Blind") enemies
- Range 5

### Sword Beam

- Available through the [unrand](/Unrand "Unrand") [artefact](/Artefact "Artefact"), the [sword of Power](/Sword_of_Power "Sword of Power")
- Deals irresistible damage, unaffected by skill
- Activates on melee hit; chance increases with HP, (10 \* HP/27)%.
- Range 4

## Major Destruction

[Makhleb](/Makhleb "Makhleb")'s Major Destruction will fire a bolt spell, some of which are now exclusive to this ability:

### [Bolt of Fire](/Bolt_of_Fire "Bolt of Fire")

- Deals [fire](/Fire "Fire") damage

### [Bolt of Magma](/Bolt_of_Magma "Bolt of Magma")

- Deals partially irresistible [fire](/Fire "Fire") damage

### [Bolt of Draining](/Bolt_of_Draining "Bolt of Draining")

- Deals [negative energy](/Negative_energy "Negative energy") damage
- Inflicts [draining](/Draining "Draining")
- Also available through Nemelex's [pain card](/Pain_card "Pain card")

### [Lightning Bolt](/Lightning_Bolt "Lightning Bolt")

- Deals [electricity](/Electricity "Electricity") damage
- Can bounce off walls; [multizaps](/Multizap "Multizap")

Major Destruction can also fire Corrosive Bolt. All bolts created by Major Destruction have a range of 7 (screen-wide).

## Monster

### [Bolt of Fire](/Bolt_of_Fire "Bolt of Fire")

- Deals pure [fire](/Fire "Fire") damage
- Range 6

### [Bolt of Cold](/Bolt_of_Cold "Bolt of Cold")

- Deals pure [cold](/Cold "Cold") damage
- Range 5

### [Crystal Bolt](/Crystal_Bolt "Crystal Bolt")

- Deals either [fire](/Fire "Fire") or [cold](/Cold "Cold") damage
- Bounces off walls
- Range 6

### [Bolt of Draining](/Bolt_of_Draining "Bolt of Draining")

- Deals [negative energy](/Negative_energy "Negative energy") damage
- Inflicts [draining](/Draining "Draining")
- Range 5

### [Bolt of Devastation](/Bolt_of_Devastation "Bolt of Devastation")

- Deals irresistible damage
- Halves willpower on a successful hit
- Range 7

### [Lightning Bolt](/Lightning_Bolt "Lightning Bolt")

- Deals [electricity](/Electricity "Electricity") damage
- Can bounce off walls; [multizaps](/Multizap "Multizap")
- Full [LOS](/LOS "LOS") range

### [Bolt of Magma](/Bolt_of_Magma "Bolt of Magma")

- Deals partially irresistible [fire](/Fire "Fire") damage
- Range 4

### [Quicksilver Bolt](/Quicksilver_Bolt "Quicksilver Bolt")

- Deals irresistible damage
- Strips [cancellable](/Potion_of_cancellation "Potion of cancellation") enchantments from targets
- Full [LOS](/LOS "LOS") range

### [Venom Bolt](/Venom_Bolt "Venom Bolt")

- Deals partially irresistible [poison](/Poison "Poison") damage
- Inflicts poison.
- Range 5

## History/Trivia

- In [0.31](/0.31 "0.31"), [Energy Bolt](/Energy_Bolt "Energy Bolt") was reworked into [Bolt of Devastation](/Bolt_of_Devastation "Bolt of Devastation").
- In [0.30](/0.30 "0.30"), [Lightning Bolt](/Lightning_Bolt "Lightning Bolt") was made monster and Makhleb only, removing the last player-castable bolt spell.
- In [0.29](/0.29 "0.29"), the [wand of quicksilver](/Wand_of_quicksilver "Wand of quicksilver") and [wand of light](/Wand_of_light "Wand of light") were added as [alternatives](/Alternate_items "Alternate items") for the [wand of acid](/Wand_of_acid "Wand of acid"). Each game can have only one "bolt" wand type now.
- In [0.28](/0.28 "0.28"), Bolt of Magma was made monster and Makhleb only.
- In [0.27](/0.27 "0.27"), Makhleb's Major Destruction was made explicitly bolt-only.
- Prior to [0.26](/0.26 "0.26"), most beam spells (except for [Shock](/Shock "Shock") and [Lightning Bolt](/Lightning_Bolt "Lightning Bolt")) had their range decreased by 1 for each target they hit.
- Most bolt spells were removed from player's libraries in the positional magic update of [0.25](/0.25 "0.25"); [Bolt of Fire](/Bolt_of_Fire "Bolt of Fire"), [Bolt of Cold](/Bolt_of_Cold "Bolt of Cold"), [Bolt of Draining](/Bolt_of_Draining "Bolt of Draining"), and [Venom Bolt](/Venom_Bolt "Venom Bolt") were removed.
- Prior to [0.21](/0.21 "0.21"), the [wand of lightning](/Wand_of_lightning "Wand of lightning") existed, which cast [Lightning Bolt](/Lightning_Bolt "Lightning Bolt").
- Prior to [0.20](/0.20 "0.20"), there were special evocable items called [rods](/Rod "Rod"); the [Rod of inaccuracy](/Rod_of_inaccuracy "Rod of inaccuracy") had a powerful but highly inaccurate bolt spell called [Bolt of Inaccuracy](/Bolt_of_Inaccuracy "Bolt of Inaccuracy"), and the [Rod of ignition](/Rod_of_ignition "Rod of ignition") could fire a special version of Bolt of Fire named [Explosive Bolt](/Explosive_Bolt "Explosive Bolt").
- Prior to [0.18](/0.18 "0.18"), there were [wands of fire](/Wand_of_fire "Wand of fire"), [cold](/Wand_of_cold "Wand of cold"), and [draining](/Wand_of_draining "Wand of draining"), which cast their bolt spells with [Evocations](/Evocations "Evocations"). The [Rod of destruction](/Rod_of_destruction "Rod of destruction"), had a special bolt spell called [Random Bolt](/Random_Bolt "Random Bolt"). In their place, the [wand of acid](/Wand_of_acid "Wand of acid") gave players access to Corrosive Bolt.
- [0.17](/0.17 "0.17") added [Corrosive Bolt](/Corrosive_Bolt "Corrosive Bolt").
- Prior to [0.16](/0.16 "0.16"), the [Tome of destruction](/Tome_of_destruction "Tome of destruction") could fire a number of these bolt spells.
- [Random Bolt](/Random_Bolt "Random Bolt") was added in [0.14](/0.14 "0.14").
- The term 'bolt' did not always refer only to spells which can hit multiple targets in a line. Notably, the spell [Iron Shot](/Iron_Shot "Iron Shot") went through the names Bolt of Iron and Iron Bolt before being renamed Iron Shot to avoid confusion, and [Throw Icicle](/Throw_Icicle "Throw Icicle") was renamed from Ice Bolt for the same reason.

  • 5 History/Trivia

Player-Castable

Almost all bolt spells have been removed from player libraries, although there are a few spells that create bolts:

  • Plasma Beam
  • Shock
  • Starburst

Evocable

Thunderbolt

  • Available through a lightning rod
  • Power determined by Evocations
  • Consecutive zaps increases strength and changes behavior of the bolt
    • Aiming for a different target creates a wide spray that covers the area between the previous bolt and the current bolt
  • Deals electricity damage; deals less damage when spread over a wide area
  • Range 5

Corrosive Bolt

  • Available to players through a wand of acid, Nemelex's Vitriol card, or Makhleb. The wand alternates with quicksilver and light.
  • Power determined by Evocations (wand) or Invocations (god)
  • Deals acid damage.
  • Inflicts corrosion.
  • Range 5

Quicksilver Bolt

  • Available to players through a wand of quicksilver, or purple draconian breath. The wand alternates with acid and quicksilver.
  • Deals irresistible damage
  • Strips cancellable enchantments from targets

Bolt of Light

  • Available to players through a wand of light. The wand alternates with acid and quicksilver.
  • Deals irresistible damage
  • Blinds enemies

  • Available through the unrand artefact, the sword of Power
  • Deals irresistible damage, unaffected by skill

  • Range 4

Major Destruction

Makhleb's Major Destruction will fire a bolt spell, some of which are now exclusive to this ability:

Bolt of Fire

  • Deals fire damage

Bolt of Magma

  • Deals partially irresistible fire damage

Bolt of Draining

  • Deals negative energy damage
  • Inflicts draining
  • Also available through Nemelex's pain card

Lightning Bolt

  • Deals electricity damage
  • Can bounce off walls; multizaps

Major Destruction can also fire Corrosive Bolt. All bolts created by Major Destruction have a range of 7 (screen-wide).

Bolt of Fire

  • Deals pure fire damage
  • Range 6

Bolt of Cold

  • Deals pure cold damage
  • Range 5

  • Deals either fire or cold damage
  • Bounces off walls
  • Range 6

History/Trivia

  • In 0.31, Energy Bolt was reworked into Bolt of Devastation.
  • In 0.30, Lightning Bolt was made monster and Makhleb only, removing the last player-castable bolt spell.
  • In 0.29, the wand of quicksilver and wand of light were added as alternatives for the wand of acid. Each game can have only one "bolt" wand type now.
  • In 0.28, Bolt of Magma was made monster and Makhleb only.
  • In 0.27, Makhleb's Major Destruction was made explicitly bolt-only.
  • Prior to 0.26, most beam spells (except for Shock and Lightning Bolt) had their range decreased by 1 for each target they hit.
  • Most bolt spells were removed from player's libraries in the positional magic update of 0.25; Bolt of Fire, Bolt of Cold, Bolt of Draining, and Venom Bolt were removed.
  • Prior to 0.21, the wand of lightning existed, which cast Lightning Bolt.
  • Prior to 0.20, there were special evocable items called rods; the Rod of inaccuracy had a powerful but highly inaccurate bolt spell called Bolt of Inaccuracy, and the Rod of ignition could fire a special version of Bolt of Fire named Explosive Bolt.
  • Prior to 0.18, there were wands of fire, cold, and draining, which cast their bolt spells with Evocations. The Rod of destruction, had a special bolt spell called Random Bolt. In their place, the wand of acid gave players access to Corrosive Bolt.
  • 0.17 added Corrosive Bolt.
  • Prior to 0.16, the Tome of destruction could fire a number of these bolt spells.
  • Random Bolt was added in 0.14.
  • The term 'bolt' did not always refer only to spells which can hit multiple targets in a line. Notably, the spell Iron Shot went through the names Bolt of Iron and Iron Bolt before being renamed Iron Shot to avoid confusion, and Throw Icicle was renamed from Ice Bolt for the same reason.
